# Gradio 

[Gradio](https://www.gradio.app/) is an open-source Python library that allows you to quickly create and share customizable machine learning web applications in Python. 


![](images/gradio.png)

It provides an easy-to-use interface for building interactive demos, enabling users to test and visualize model outputs in real-time.
